jadex.examples.ping
Agent Ping

jadex.examples.ping.Ping
  • jadex.planlib.Ping
    • agent Ping
    contains jadex.planlib.Ping

    Ping Agent for answering ping requests.

    Reacts on "ping" query-ref and sends back inform "alive".
